name: 1000xtranslate
description: A collection of tools to translate 1000xRESIST into your language

scripts.install:tools: cd tools/ThousandXSpreadSheet && npm install && cd ../svscript-convert && npm install
scripts.tool:svscript-convert: npm run check && cd tools/svscript-convert && ../check-function.sh && node index.js
scripts.function:exporter: npm run check && cd 1-exporter && ../tools/check-function.sh && source .venv/bin/activate && python3 main.py
scripts.function:sheetifier: npm run check && cd 2-sheetifier && ../tools/check-function.sh && node index.js
scripts.function:desheetifier: npm run check && cd 5-desheetifier && ../tools/check-function.sh && node index.js
scripts.function:bbb: npm run check && cd 6-boom-boom-build && ../tools/check-function.sh && source .venv/bin/activate && python3 main.py
scripts.install: npm run install:tools && npm run install:exporter && npm run install:sheetifier && npm run install:translator && npm run install:checker && npm run install:desheetifier && npm run install:bbb
scripts.init: npm run function:exporter && npm run function:sheetifier
scripts.build: npm run function:desheetifier && npm run function:bbb

author: deseven
